tool_description: An API to download videos & playlists from Youtube
name: Youtube video & playlist Downloader
title: Youtube video & playlist Downloader

api_list.name: download playlist
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to download a playlist from YouTube by providing the playlist URL and the desired resolution ('audio' or 'mp4'). The endpoint will return a JSON object with the data of each video in the playlist, including the title, thumbnail, duration, channel name, and URLs to download the videos in the desired resolution.

api_list.name: download video
api_list.description: This endpoint should accept a video ID and a resolution as inputs and should return the direct URL to the video in the specified resolution, as well as other information such as the title, thumbnail, duration, and channel name of the video. Additionally, it should also include the file size and media type of the video.
